name: GiantROM
description:
Entry for the Giant ROM game jam. Collect all the tacos and avoid the mayo and Metal Gear RAY who will chase you around the map! Can you scale Vinny to find the final Taco?

(Bit of a bug - don't talk to Drew until you find all the tacos it will rest the map)

(Also don't jump in the water or you will get stuck!)

(Also also if you die you have to watch the intro again)

Enjoy!
